title: Top tech conferences
description: For better or worse, conferences appear to be back, so to help you work out what events to head to in 2023, TechRadar Pro has curated a list of the most important international technology events and conferences coming this year

title: Big tech events
description: September 26th marks Vox Media’s Code event, which includes Verge editor-in-chief Nilay Patel co-hosting alongside Platformer founder Casey Newton and CNBC senior media and tech correspondent Julia Boorstin.

title: Top Tech Events
description: Check out the best tech events happening around the world – from cool space tech to awesome robotics, we’ve found the top events you won’t want to miss. Take a look at these events that we think you should definitely check out.

title: Biggest conferences
description: Technology conferences bring together thousands of digital nomads and experts worldwide. These events are often the highlight of the year for many professionals. We have compiled a list of the most significant technological events in Europe.
